children.subject:
Hi Gary,  I am the anon who posted the question.  

I checked telebears and I was able to change my grading option.

You can also add your lab section on telebears since the CCN is

given on schedule.berkeley.edu.  I did so and there was no problem.

This thread is resolved :)

The Pass/Not Pass option for EECS 151LA was not intentional and should now be corrected. Thanks!

Gary, please enroll into a lab separately. The labs are not linked to the lecture as they correspond to either CS or EE labs. Please put yourself on the waitlist for the lab that makes sense for you and then I will manually enroll you into the class.

  • EECS 151LA corresponds with the former EE 141 lab
  • EECS 151LB corresponds with the former CS 150 lab

I  do not think the lab sections have been finalized. Also I'm not sure if we are suppose to enroll into the labs or not because as per Sara's letter, I dropped out of CS150 and waitlisted myself for EECS 151. I was later enrolled into the lecture and discussion, but received no other information about getting into a lab. So don't worry too much anonymous. I figure the first day of lecture will cover all this too.

history.content:
Hello,

I see that the EECS 151 LB section has units which can be taken for a letter grade and P/NP.

However EECS 151 LA can only be taken on a PF basis.  Is this done intentionally or is this

an error to be fixed.  It doesn't seem fair to make it PF for those who are interested in the EE 141

side of the course.

Thank you.
history.subject: EECS 151 LA Lab Section Units
